channel.title: quality on Ivan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in quality on Ivan's blog

item.title: The story of Boeing as a lesson for us all
item.description: During one of my interviews in late 2023 - ealy 2024, a person asked me: “Who cares about the language we choose or frameworks or type system… all that matters is a working product”. I wrote about it already, but I used a clumsy analogy with building a house. Recently however, the internet (or at least, the algorithms that take care of my YouTube feed) started buzzing with news about the problems at Boeing.
